author: Chao Hick Tin JA (delivering the grounds of decision of the court):
casename: Ng Chee Chuan v Ng Ai Tee (administratrix of the estate of Yap Yoon Moi, deceased)
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA; V K Rajah JA
counsel: Davinder Singh SC, Chenthil Kumar Kumarasingam and Una Khng (Drew & Napier LLC) for the appellant; Chia Swee Chye Kelvin (Balkenende Chew & Chia) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Contract/Breach/Breach of alleged oral agreement/Whether there was alleged oral agreement

Evidence/Witnesses/Inappropriate to rely primarily on credibility of witnesses as basis for drawing factual interferences where events in question had taken place many years ago and there were undisputed objective facts/Availability of contemporaneous documents reduced need to rely on testimony of witnesses on stand
